onboarding.description: Intelligent obstacle avoidance based on community experience.

onboarding.weEstimatedYourBikeDimensions: We estimated your bikes dimensions. If you dont know your exact bike dimensions don't worrie. You can change these values later in the Settings view.

settings.yourMessageToUs: YOUR MESSAGE TO US. Feel free to provide us any thought you have about the project, cargobike-index, routing etc.
settings.projectWebsiteSubtitle: More about the project and blog

modals.settingsUpdatedMessage: You have successfully updated your bike settings. Now we can provide you routes to make your ride as smooth as possible!
modals.welcomeMessage: The CargoRocket App provides you navigation and project insights. We aim to make your ride as smooth as possible!
modals.navigationErrorMessage: Something went wrong! Feel free to leave feedback for our developers.
modals.locationErrorMessage: Please check your location service is enabled and the correct access rights have been provided for this application.
modals.feedbackSendMessage: Thank you for your support! We will try to implement your suggestions as fast as possible.

project.description: CargoRocket was formed in December 2020, at the MobiData Hackathon. Our mission is to provide insights into the needs of cargo-bike drivers and an overview of the current infrastructure. Based on this information we generate Reports, Indexes and provide routing solutions
